sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个连接词均含"是否"之意。
means: if ： 作"是否"解时，多用于口语，引出宾语从句，不能直接跟or not连用。
whether ： 多用于书面语中，可与or或or not连用，除引出宾语从句外，还可引出主语从句、表语从句、同位语从句或与不定式连用。

sentence.Network_en: The key issue was whether the four defendants acted dishonestly.
sentence.Network_cn: 关键问题是4名被告是否存在欺诈行为。

sentence.Network_en: It's not a case of whether anyone would notice or not.
sentence.Network_cn: 这不是会不会有人注意到的问题。

sentence.Network_en: Whether such properties are a good deal will depend on individual situations.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的地产是否可获得大笔收益还要视具体情形而定。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 初中英语单词大全（不容错过）_中考英语_读书人 ... 1790 tomb n 坟墓 1791 whether conj 是否 1792 edge n 边，边缘.
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... whereas conj. 面，其实，既然 whether conj. 无论，不管 whichever a. 无论哪个.
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... whereas conj. 面，其实，既然 whether conj. 无论，不管 whichever a. 无论哪个.
Mr Wang asked the Black Dragon whether the divinity approved his appointment as temple chief ., 王问黑龙王 , 他能否做寺院主持 , 龙应允了.

list.abs: They asked whether I was prepared to vouch for him ., 他们问我是否愿意为他作担保.
whether or no 不管怎样BR>whether or not 是否whether or 还是whether
GCT英语_百度文库 ... what if 如果…将会怎样， 即使…又有什么要紧 Whether or 是…还是…，不管…还是… wipe out 消灭，毁灭.
whether there is any other insurance in force ., 是否有其他保险存在.
whether you will pass the test depends on yourself ., 你是否能通过考试主要靠自己.
whether you were brought up in a slum ., 您是否被带到了一个贫民窟.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hwæther, hwether, of Germanic origin; related to German weder 'neither'

encyclopedia.content: whether conj. 1. 锛堃济蚀泳滹級是否 Ask him whether he can come or not.问问他是否能来。 I don't know whether you like flowers, sir. 先生，我不知道您是否喜欢花。 2. (与or连用，引导状语从句)不管是。..锛埢蚴秋級 We'll go on with the work, whether we can find the necessary tools or not. 不管我们能否找到所需的工具，我们要把这件工作做下去。 在引导定语从句时，一般情况下whether和if都可使用，但whether

entry.tran: (表示选择或怀疑)是否，是不是
entry.def: You use whether when you are talking about a choice or doubt between two or more alternatives.

example.ex: To this day, it's unclear whether he shot himself or was murdered...
example.tran: 至今尚不清楚他究竟是饮弹自杀还是被谋杀。

example.ex: Whether it turns out to be a good idea or a bad idea, we'll find out...
example.tran: 它到底是个好主意还是坏主意我们很快会见分晓。

entry.def: You use whether to say that something is true in any of the circumstances that you mention.

example.ex: This happens whether the children are in two-parent or one-parent families...
example.tran: 不管孩子是生活在双亲还是单亲家庭，这种情况都会发生。

example.ex: Whether they say it aloud or not, most men expect their wives to be faithful.
example.tran: 大多数男人还是希望他们的妻子对自己忠诚，不管他们有没有将这一想法大声说出来。

auth_sentence.content: Whether we develop a rivalry remains to be seen.

auth_sentence.content: Whether it was pre-meditated, we don't know.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whether it was pre-meditated, we don't know.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whether it was pre-meditated, we don't know.

auth_sentence.content: I asked whether she'd take up sport again.
auth_sentence.res_content: I asked whether she'd take up sport again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I asked whether she'd take up sport again.

sentences.en: She was in doubt whether she was right.
sentences.cn: 她对她是否正确拿不准。

jushi.english: Whether we go to your place or stay here,we'll still find something to eat.
jushi.chinese: 不管我们是到你那里去还是呆在这儿,我们都需要找点东西吃。

jushi.english: She was in doubt whether she was right.
jushi.chinese: 她对她是否正确拿不准。

jushi.english: I haven't settled the question of whether I'll go back home.
